chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent:
|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| ![mongodb](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wavefront-img/mongodb.svg) | This dashboard shows mongostat and dbstat metrics for your mongoDB nodes, more metrics can be added based on your requirements. Telegraf also collects system level metrics of your host platform (eg. Linux, Windows, Docker etc.) You can clone, combine and customize these dashboards per your requirement and use-case. To collect metrics from a new mongoDB node, install an agent on the newly added node using instructions from [host integration](/integrations). Objects covered in this dashboard include: Host and Database. |

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: sum(ts(mongodb.db.stats.avg.obj.size, source="${0_host_scope}" and db_name="${2_database_scope}") * ts(mongodb.db.stats.objects, source="${0_host_scope}" and db_name="${2_database_scope}")) / sum(ts(mongodb.db.stats.objects, source="${0_host_scope}" and db_name="${2_database_scope}"))

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: sum(ts(mongodb.db.stats.index.size, source="${0_host_scope}" and db_name="${2_database_scope}")) / sum(ts(mongodb.db.stats.indexes, source="${0_host_scope}" and db_name="${2_database_scope}"))

chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent: **Note:** *This dashboard is provided by Wavefront. It's not directly editable, which lets us deploy new versions without affecting any of your customizations. If you want to make your own version, click ![pencil](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wavefront-img/pen-icon.png) **> Clone** and give the dashboard a new URL*.
